ITF Delegation Here 
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Taekwon-do Federation headed by Senior Vice-President Ri Ki Ha arrived here Tuesday.
 It was met at the airport by Ryu Song Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Taekwon-do Committee.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Cuban Delegation 
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba.
 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned Tuesday by Lieut. General Leonardo Andouo Valdes, vice-chief of its General Staff and director of the Operations Department, who is heading the delegation.

articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Gabonese Ambassador
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Gabonese Ambassador to the DPRK Emmanuel Mba Allo at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 On hand were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Choe Su Hon and staff members of the Gabonese embassy.    
 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Gabonese President
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Gabonese President El Haji Omar Bongo Ondimba.
 It was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on May 4 by Emmanuel Mba Allo, Gabonese ambassador to the DPRK.
